#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,temp,c,x=0;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF){
    temp=n;
    while(temp)
    {
                  c=temp%10;
                  temp/=10;
                  if(c!=0)
                  if(n%c!=0)
                  {x=1;
                  break;
                  }       
    }
    if(x==1)
    printf("Invalid\n");
    else
    printf("Valid\n");
	}
    return 0;
}
